description:
Kuro is a junior high school student who is Ramune`s disciple and works as an assistant. He has good judgment and motor skills, as well as a rational mind. It`s hard to understand his mood due to having a poker face and is always having to play the straight man when Ramune says or does anything. Kuro trusts Ramune`s skills as a specialist of mystery diseases completely.
Source: Official page
name: Kuro
